summary: This is an email from a Victim Witness Coordinator at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, dated July 9, 2020. The email states that a victim of Jeffrey Epstein has contacted the office seeking to file a claim for Crime Victims compensation, and the coordinator has sent her the Florida application and will follow up.

persons.name: Victim Witness Coordinator
persons.context: The sender of the email, working at the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, who is assisting a victim of Jeffrey Epstein with a compensation claim.

events.title: Victim Inquiry for Compensation
events.description: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein contacts the U.S. Attorney's Office seeking to file a claim for Crime Victims compensation.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein contacted the U.S. Attorney's Office in July 2020 seeking compensation.
The Victim Witness Coordinator sent the victim a Florida application for Crime Victims compensation.
The email indicates ongoing victim assistance efforts by the Southern District of New York related to the Epstein case.
